<Joseph Lewis Cunningham

--------------------
Text: Joseph Lewis Cunningham:  Among the many lots he sold were birds, horses, real estate, furniture, sea captains' charts, telescopes, American and European artworks, fishing line, feathers, fabric, guns, musical instruments, fruit trees, flower seeds, printers' equipment, and books.
